message: I'm being generous in this first round, but I'm sure you can understand why I'm keeping the lion's share.  Let's see what you have to offer.
Alice, your offer was quite generous, but the current economic climate necessitates a more equitable split. Let's be practical.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the situation. This is a fair offer, considering the current circumstances.  Let's end this game.
